AUTH_HEADER_UNSUPPORTED.description: Authorization header type is unsupported by the API

AUTH_TOKEN_EXPIRED.description: Auth token has expired, a new one must be created

DUPL_AUTH_PLUGIN_REG.description: An auth plugin is already registered with the same name

MISSING_AUTH_HEADER.description: Authorization headers are missing from request

UNAUTHENTICATED.description: Request is not authenticated for access to the API

UNAUTHORISED.description: Request is not authorised to perform the required operation

UNKNOWN_AUTH_TYPE.description: Request is attempting to use an unknown authentication type
